select
from ljcx_task_log a
and LOCATE(#{item.key},a.name) > 0
and a.is_delete = 1

select a.id,a.task_id,a.type,a.name,a.create_time,a.memo,b.nickname userName,c.name taskName,a.records_id from ljcx_task_log a left join account_user_base b on a.create_user = b.id left join ljcx_task c on c.id = a.task_id where a.id = #{id}

select a.id,a.task_id,a.type,a.name,a.create_time,a.memo,b.nickname userName,c.name taskName,a.records_id from ljcx_task_log a left join account_user_base b on a.create_user = b.id left join ljcx_task c on c.id = a.task_id where a.task_id = #{taskId}
